dialog.title: Import Daggerheart Statblock
dialog.placeholder: Paste your Daggerheart statblock text here...
dialog.instructions: Copy the statblock text from freshcutgrass.app and paste it in the text area below. The module will parse the text and create a new actor in your world.

notifications.success: Successfully imported {name} as a new actor!
notifications.empty: Please provide a statblock to import.

errors.noName: Could not find creature name in statblock
